text: " ayi aaththamme?

pitipasse lalla ayin kalama lachchuwe kelawarama thiyenne mage fayil eka . . .

nagaraye poth kadayakata goda wadunu ma haf shit bandalayakuth, satahan bahalimata men ma, haf shitwala liwime di aadharakayak lesa bhawitha kirimata da haki ghana plastik fayil kawarayakuth, wiwidha warnaye pan kihipayakuth milata gaththemi.

ema nisa thamayi mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma mahinda chinthana idiri dakme pahadiliwa sadahan kale hama niwasak ahimi pawulak sadahama ethumage palana kalaya thula niwasak labadimata katayuthu karana bawa.
ee samangama ohuge durakathanaya nada wiya.
onna madhuranga sahodaraya gane oththu karuta chiththaredda piliganwana awasthawa.
me wenakota annasi gaswala paladawa thiyenawa.
pakej ehema ???
emenma wishayanubaddha palapurudda adukama thula thamata maha banku bandumkara hithumathe bhawithakala haki bawa ohuge aramuna wannata athi.
eda ee aandukarawarayage anin sinhala minisun ella maru siyambaala gasa thibenneth me aasannaye.
mage wayasa 27.
yanna kalin thawa deyak kiyanna oona.
kakulu rosa mal deka......

mema udgathawa athi thathwaya pilibadawa thama wisin janadhipathithuman danuwath kara athi athara mema warjana kriyawaliya akhandawa kriyathmaka kalahoth magi janathawata siduwana apahasuthawaya walakwima sadaha oonama kriyamargayak ganimata katayuthu karana bawada awadharanaya karayi.
nandage illima itu nowunu athara ihatha ki lesa ohuge maranaya puwathpathwalata punchi puwathak wiya.
eya nishprabha wi atha.
thilak marapana kiya.
dan me baklink eka hadanna yanne
obata kalekadi hari giyapu sambandhaya kalaye wenasath ekka nogalapenna puluwan.
yesus kristhus yanu kawarekda?
"liyon trotskige aarakshawa sandaha" yana mathrukawa yatathe pawathi raswima jarmanu ithihasagnyayinge 49wana samuluwehi kotasak lesa pawathwini.
namuth me aasadana walata niyama hethuwak hoyaganna apahasuyi.
mehe thiyenawa mama danna thanak sar.
owa oheama thama.
sidu wu ekama deya pe්rakshakayata swapna mochanaya bandu thawakalika chun ekak labima pamani.

”ti.en.ee eka eekiya rataka budu dahama piligana balaya bedimakata sudanam wela thiyeddi pedaral illana wigneshwaran siwajilingam pe්ramachandran ponnambalamla dan wenamama sandhanayak hadagena yannayi balanne” lakshman kirialla kiya.
inpasu eya ibema watena athara, pekaniya asala sampurnayen suwa wimata thawath dina 7th 10th athara kalayak gathawe.

amathiwaraya lawa yakada yaka waranaya karawu kumanth ranaya digatama pawathiya di 2004 okthobar masa 1 dina eya gana yali salaka balamu yayi thiranayak gaththada eeta pera dina sakwithi kirula hara wayasa awurudu 68 di ja ala pihiti thama niwasedi gamini fonseka melowin gosini.
thawath wareka eya charitha kathawaka lakshana prakata karayi.
namuth pasuwa thel wikunana mahallek nisa ohu nihathamani kenek bawata path wuna.
ee wagema eyalagen wadi denekwa nidahas karagena thiyanawa kiyala.
lesiyen ma sinhala tayip karanna widiyaklesiyen ma sin...

eelam rajyayak godanangima sandaha jathyanthara dayasporaweda sahaya athiwa thrasthawadi kriyadamayakata dadiwa awathirnawa siti mema el.ti.ti.ee. sanwidhanaya parajaya karamin, minis palihak lesa bhawitha kala laksha sankhyatha wu ahinsaka damila wasiyan in muda ganimata yuda, nawika saha guwan hamudawanhi aprathihatha kapawima, dhairyaya saha mana salasum sahagathabhawaya hethu kotagena hakiyawa labini.
- indunil usgoda aarachchi (rawaya) maithripalata nopenena araliya hotale parisara winashaya.
shopin ekkagena yanawa.
aa giyeth digalla rewatha maha widyalayatamayi.
ee nisa wenasakatath ekka api thi්rawil ekenma raswimata yamu da ?
manushyathwayen piri lowak sandaha mewani thirashchina pudgalayange jiwitha lowen iwath kala yuthuyi.
sayirisa ga්rika dhanapathi ka්ramayata da yuropa sangamayata da kapawu sanwidhanayaki.
bauddha nowana prekshakayangenda apita wishala piliganimak thiyanawa.

shri lanka nidahas pakshaye madhya prakashaka, rajya amathya dilan perera haliala - katapola pradeshaye eeye pawathi jana hamuwakata ekwemin kiya sitiye mathiwarana komisame sabhapathiwarayage wadi kamaththa pawathinne manapa kramayata chandaya pawathwimata bawayi.
aneka dayatama thibena bawa api dannawa.
ebawin goliyawa athi "demalata ratak nomathiwima" namathi prashnayata ekama ha sangatha lesath ithihasikawath hodama wisaduma thamilnaduwa thula demala eelama goda nagimayi.
mage payiya witharak neweyi mulu yati badama hiri watila giya.
enam sewa kalaya, jyeshtathwaya rakiyawe usaswim labannata sudusukama wiyayuthu bawa.
namuth sandipata nam sina nagune natha..
newinam kids muwi ekakata drayiwin job eka karanawa :)]
ehemanam ithin ape warthamanaya bol neda?
mama ekama charithayata sima wela naha.
bedumwadi demala eelam wimukthi koti sanwidhanayata erehiwa kolambaa aandu gena giya wargawadi yuddhaya awasan wi wasara nawayak gathawa athimuth uthura thawamath hamuda palanaya yatathe pawathi.
mama nokalath nokarannemi eya garahima...
fati liwar saha thawa ee ha sambandha podi podi gatalu thiyenawalu (ooka kalinuth thibbane)...

ebawin dhanawadayata wiruddha wima deshapalana ka්riyawaka ruju ilakkaya nowana bawa sathyaya wana namuth deshapalanayedi yamek handuna nogath ‘samaja ka්ramayakata’ nowa sanyuktha deshapalana eejanthayinta saha owunge ka්riyakarakam walata erehi wiya yuthu we.
thama hoda thathwe thibbata koyi wele oya aakalpaya nathi weyida danne na.
brithanya agamathiwaraya we.
menna pothe nama.

ibba ithin me stor karala thiyana than hoya ganne fayils pamp eke sarch boks eke film eke nama gahala sarch karala.ethakota risalts list ekak pahala watenawa.eewaye podi wisthara kalith thiyanawa.eewa diha balala api hoyana eka thora ganna puluwan.methanadi midiya fayar hari mega aplod hari links thiyanawanam apita wadath wasiyi.godak wita rapidsheyar link thama enne.balanna eewa oopan karala kali tika 1,2,3…
eheth eyata karumaya gewimata siduwa aththe rate janathawataya.
sumana saman dew adawiyata mayimwa katharagama dew anuhasa pathirunu sundara walawa mitiyawathe pihitiya wu ambailipitiya kawanthissa raja samayata ayath wari karmanthawalin poshanaya labayi.
eheth, danata wadiyen piliganna gayigarge gananaya kirim anuwa sambuddha parinirwanaya sidu wi thibenne kristhu purwa 483di wana athara meya eeta wasara 65kata pera wasaraki.
anna niyama sahodara premaya...
onarabal aar.ke. kiwwahama kawuda?
ape gama wayambaa palathe..mama nam kolambaa ta aasama naha...loke mona nagaretath wada mama aasa mage gamata......
siriyawa ha wenath ratawalin pala ena saranagathayan piligannayi siyalu katholika ratawala nayakayan gen ethuma illa sitiyeya.

idiriyedi pawathwena aasiyanu ha loka aarakshaka sewa krida ulelin pasuwa bich wolibol kridawata samudena bawa lusafoniyanu bich wolibol ridi padakkama dina ganimen anathuruwa ohu pawasiya.wasara 2003di shri lankawe bich wolibol aarambha kirime sita akhandawa kridawe nirathawu mahesh perera nawika hamudawe sewaya karayi.
ethakota ara dewal tharkayen nishpraha kala kiyala ethanin prashnaya iwara wenne na.
dan unta purajeru witharayi koranna wenne.
ee karyayata yam kisi kenek badha pamunuwanawa nam yugaye karya bharaya itukala yuthuyi.
eeth para mata thiyena prashne thamayi, dipthita koheda gata kiyana eka.
me satahana liyana 2016 juni 4 wana da ape ”shanida sadaya” guwan widuli wada satahane di udaya magen pa්rashnayak asuwe ya.
issellama mewa enne panata nemeyi.

un hara wena kittuwa patha kawuruwath nathdayi sarakota asa thibe.wasanthage niwesata kittuwa padinchi dakshina adhiwegi margaye kurundugahahathapma piwisume sewaya karana sunil shantha namathi polis niladhariyaku sitina bawa pawasu wita “anna uu ekkagena waren” yanuwen pawasa atha.wasanthage biriya gos ohu kandawagena pamini wita pamina siti polis niladharin ohuta owunge handunumpath penwa atha.inpasu wasanthagen wenwi polis niladharin dedena ha sunil shantha kathika kota aparadha anshaye es. ayi. kenaku yayi ki pudgalaya mese pawasa atha.“umbaa api athaharinnam apata laksha thunak dipan” ma langa etharam mudalak na ki wita ehenam laksha ekahamarak dipan yanuwen pawasa atha.
mesamagama thawath waidya pita kihipayak nirmanaya karana lesa api aanduwata yojana karanawa.
dewa ekka tharunayan dennek newasikawa innawa.
mata eeka mathak wenakota danuth papuwa hosgala paththu wenawa‘’ punyawathi, athitha wedanabara mathakaya yali paraganimin pawasuwaya.
gase anekuth siyalu kotas wiwidha prayojana sahithayi.

hamadama shampu gana eka bro echchara hoda deyak nemeyi.eken konde wiyali gathiya wagema kadena gathiyath wadiwenna puluwan.e wagema hodam de shampu eke thiyena salfet,ditarjants lewal eka wadi nam eka pawichchi nokara inna eka.ewalin hise thiyena sbawika thel ayin karana nisa.me thelata hamoma kamathi nathi unata konde soft ekata saha shayin ekata thiyenne meken thamayi.

ee anuwa sakakaru samanga ayuthu lesa sakachcha kirimata uthsaha daru withthiye nithignyayin dedenage nam sandahan warthawak da adhikaranayata idiripath kirimata aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwe niladhariya piyawara gena thibuna.adhikaranayen laba gath nothisi eki handuna ganime perattuwa sandaha kadawa thibu sisun wetha bharadimen anathuruwa ekthara kandayamak owunta wishala washayen balapam kara athayi da aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa adhikaranayata karunu idiripath kara thibu bawa sandahan.sakakara hijas hisbulla sabhapathithwaya darana sew da parls sosayiti namathi sanwidhanaya magin puththalama al suhariya madrasa pasalata yomu kara thibu sisunta ohu wisin aagamikayan kerehi wairisahagatha hagim athi wana paridi deshana saha puhunuwim dun bawata ema sisun aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwata prakasha labadi thibuna.me athara pasku praharaye windithayin wenuwen thama sanwidhanaya methek shri lankawata aadhara mudalak laba di nomathi bawa loka muslim ligaya pawasanawa.
